assessments.status_rationale: Today’s coverage includes political and regulatory developments but no reports of a DOJ remedies filing in the Google Search antitrust case or any proposal language about banning default-search payments. Deadline remains 2025-10-31.
No articles mention the LBMA Gold Price PM fixing at or above $2,650/oz. With a deadline of 2025-10-31 and no clear price data today, outcome is not yet determined.
News notes falling rates and an S&P 500 record, but provides no confirmed DGS10 close at or below 3.95%. The deadline is 2025-09-30, so this remains unresolved.
Apple’s September event has not occurred yet (scheduled for 2025-09-09). No pricing announcement for the iPhone 16 Pro appears in today’s news.
There is no reporting on ICE Endex Dutch TTF front-month settlements today. With the deadline on 2025-10-31, no outcome can be verified.
No NOAA SWPC G3 (Strong) storm watch or warning is referenced in the news items. The window remains open until 2025-10-31 (UTC).
August 2025 CPI-U core m/m is scheduled for release on 2025-09-11. Today’s news does not include the BLS report, so the forecast cannot yet be scored.
